H3.text: what is the largest nation in europe. Russia

A4.text: It is the largest country in the world, spanning eleven time zones and sharing land borders with fourteen countries.

A5.text: With a population of over 140 million, Russia is the most populous country in Europe and the ninth-most populous in the world.
